content.text:
# Kingspade (album)

Kingspade is the eponymous debut album of the American rap duo Kingspade. Kingspade was a long-awaited album as it was promoted throughout albums from the group's alternate band, the Kottonmouth Kings. On the week of September 11, 2004 the album hit #11 on the Billboard Top Internet Albums chart, #44 on Top Heatseekers, and #31 on Top Independent Albums.
Singles
*"Drunk in the Club"
*"Spaded Jaded & Faded"
*"Who's Down?"
